text: Twenty-seven patients enrolled the study and were allocated to the intervention (n ¼ 14) or control group (n ¼ 13) by block randomization according to gender, age (<6 years, 6e12 years, >12 years) and diagnosis (ALL, AML and others). Allocation concealment was guaranteed by the use of random numbers. The final sample was comprised of 27 patients who met the inclusion criteria as illustrated in the flow diagram in Fig. 1 (Schulz et al., 2010) .
sentences: Twenty-seven patients enrolled the study and were allocated to the intervention (n ¼ 14) or control group (n ¼ 13) by block randomization according to gender, age (<6 years, 6e12 years, >12 years) and diagnosis (ALL, AML and others).
Allocation concealment was guaranteed by the use of random numbers.
The final sample was comprised of 27 patients who met the inclusion criteria as illustrated in the flow diagram in Fig. 1 (Schulz et al., 2010) .
